title: Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain | Latest Telugu cinema news | Movie reviews | OTT Updates, OTT - 123telugu
summary:
Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain

Published on Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Latest Telugu Cinema News

The prestigious Dhoom franchise is set to be revived, with reports confirming Ranbir Kapoor as the main villain and a popular South Indian star also being considered for a significant role.

  • Ranbir Kapoor cast as the main villain in Dhoom 4.
  • A popular South Indian star, rumored to be NTR Jr., is being considered for the villain role.
  • Yash Raj Films is in talks with multiple potential candidates for the villain character.
  • Speculation suggests Ayan Mukerji could direct Dhoom 4, having previously worked on Yash Raj Films' War.
  • Abhishek Bachchan and Uday Chopra's absence from this installment has raised fan curiosity about the casting.
“Fans are eager to see who will be cast in this big-budget action drama.”

The anticipation for Dhoom 4 grows as notable changes are mentioned, including the potential of high-profile cast announcements.

title: 'Who wouldn't want': Siddharth Shivpuri on entering Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai - India Forums

Siddharth Shivpuri Joins Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai as Roop Kumar

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 1:56 PM | Source: Star Plus

Introduction: The popular show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai has introduced a new character, Roop Kumar, played by Siddharth Shivpuri, aiming to bring a fresh angle to the storyline.

  • Roop Kumar is characterized as a smart and supportive individual stepping into Abhira's life during a difficult time.

  • Siddharth expressed his excitement about joining the show, mentioning his long-standing desire to work with Rajan Sir.
  • His entry is anticipated to add depth and excitement to the plot, drawing viewer interest.

I'm thrilled to work with Rajan Sir. I've wanted to collaborate with him for a long time, but things didn't align.

- Siddharth Shivpuri

Conclusion: Siddharth Shivpuri's entry as Roop Kumar is expected to introduce unexpected twists in the storyline, promising viewers a captivating experience in the upcoming episodes.

  • Aishwarya Rajesh plays the role of Bhagyalakshmi, Venkatesh's wife, and her performance has resonated strongly with audiences.

  • Aishwarya mentioned that 2-3 actresses declined the role, feeling grateful for the opportunity herself.

Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma recently celebrated the 'griha-pravesh' of their new holiday home in Alibaug, complete with luxurious amenities such as a temperature-controlled pool.

  • The home is reported to have cost around Rs 32 crore, with the land purchased for Rs 19 crore and construction costing an additional Rs 13 crore.
  • It includes a bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, and a sprawling garden.
  • The villa was designed by the globally acclaimed architecture firm SAOTA.

“Virat Kohli's Alibaug villa features a temperature-controlled pool, a bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, a sprawling garden, covered parking, staff quarters and more.”

summary:

Published on: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Sankranthiki Vasthunam had a stellar opening at the Telugu box office, earning approximately Rs. 22 crore on its first day. The film attracted massive audiences, particularly in the Telugu states, marking a significant success for the production.

  • The film grossed around Rs. 22 crore on its first day.
  • Approximately Rs. 19 crore came from the Telugu states, with notable contributions from Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.

  • This successful opening offers significant relief to the producer after previous project losses.
  • The film sets an ambitious goal to surpass previous box office records for family entertainers.
“This will be the scene for the next couple of days with an extended holiday period in the twin states.”

summary:
Lee Jung Jae Shocks Fans with Unfiltered Appearance at Netflix Event

Date: January 15, 2025

Source: News18

South Korean actor Lee Jung Jae garnered attention for his return to Netflix's Squid Game Season 2, but his recent unfiltered appearance has sparked mixed reactions from fans.

  • Lee appeared at a Netflix event showcasing signs of aging, including visible wrinkles and fine lines.
  • His natural look contrasts sharply with the polished images typically seen in Squid Game.
  • Fans expressed shock on social media, with comments ranging from criticism to support for Lee's authentic appearance.
  • Despite mixed reactions, many defended the actor, emphasizing the reality of aging.
  • During the event, Lee spoke about new characters in the upcoming season and expressed his hopes for viewer engagement.
“Time is really scary,” remarked one fan, while another added, “He is 52. Of course he’s going to have some wrinkles; what’s the issue?”

Lee's unedited look has sparked important conversations about aging in the entertainment industry and the pressure of maintaining appearance.
newTitle: Lee Jung Jae Shocks Fans with Unfiltered Appearance at Netflix Event

On January 15, stars Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan paid heartfelt tributes to the Indian Army, sharing personal moments with soldiers and celebrating their bravery on social media.

  • Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan celebrated Indian Army Day by honoring soldiers.
  • Sunny shared videos of his interactions with jawans, chanting patriotic slogans.
  • Varun posted pictures from the sets of Border 2, emphasizing the importance of the armed forces.
  • Border 2 is set for release in January 2026 and features a star-studded cast.

“Then, Now, and Forever Saluting the courage, sacrifice, and unwavering dedication of our heroes. Happy Indian Army Day!” – Sunny Deol

title: This Bollywood star quit films at his peak to fight in Kargil War, lost 20 kg at the front serving Indian Army - Hindustan Times
summary:
Bollywood Star Nana Patekar's Bravery During Kargil War

Date: Jan 15, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Nana Patekar, a celebrated Bollywood actor, put his acting career on hold to serve in the Kargil War, distinguishing himself as part of the Quick Response Team.

  • Nana Patekar lived and trained with the Indian Army for three years before the Kargil War.
  • He sought permission from Defense Minister George Fernandes to join the front lines during the war.
  • He served over two weeks near the Line of Control (LoC) and helped in medical cases as well.
  • Patekar dramatically lost 20 kg during his time at the front due to the severe conditions.
  • After returning, he resumed his successful acting career, most recently starring in the film Vanvaas.
“I was 76 kg when I reached Srinagar. By the time I came back, I was 56 kg.” - Nana Patekar

Nana Patekar's story exemplifies remarkable bravery and dedication, emphasizing the connection between art and national service.
newTitle: Bollywood Star Nana Patekar's Bravery During Kargil War

Star cricketer Virat Kohli recently returned to Mumbai from his holiday home in Alibaug, showcasing a lavish property complete with luxury amenities.

  • The bungalow was built on an 8-acre plot acquired for approximately Rs 19 crore in 2022.

Madha Gaja Raja, starring Vishal, Anjali, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Santhanam, has finally made its long-awaited release after 11 years, achieving impressive box office success. Originally set to release in 2013, the film has now emerged as a frontrunner in Kollywood for 2025.

  • Opening collection: 3 crores on Day 1
  • Steady earnings: 3 crores on Day 2
  • Dramatic jump: 6.20 crores on Day 3 (106% increase)

Total earnings after three days: 12.20 crores, with potential to become a notable success in the current box office.

The film is produced on a budget of 15 crores, expecting to recover the production costs swiftly given its positive reception.

summary:
Celebrities Celebrate Pongal and Makar Sankranti with Heartfelt Wishes

Published on: Jan 15, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The festive spirit was alive among celebrities as they celebrated Pongal and Makar Sankranti with their loved ones. From newlywed couples to doting parents, many took to social media to share glimpses of their celebrations, expressing gratitude, love, and well-wishes for the year ahead.

Take a look:

  • Actors Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya celebrated their first Pongal, Sankranti after wedding.
  • Actor Nayanthara shared a glimpse of her celebrations and captioned, "Let us express our heartfelt thanks to the Tamil farmers who make us live. Happy Pongal wishes.."
  • Actor Rashmika Mandanna wished her followers saying, “Happiest Sankranthi/Pongal my loves. I hope this year brings you all the love, happiness and good health.”
  • Actor Keerthy Suresh introduced her grandson during Pongal celebrations, wishing everyone a beautiful festival.
  • Actor Shilpa Shetty Kundra celebrated with her mother and visited the temple, sharing festive greetings.
“Happy Makar Sankranti. Til gud ghya god god bola.” - Shilpa Shetty Kundra

This festive season has been marked by love and gratitude among friends and family, capturing the essence of Pongal and Makar Sankranti.
newTitle: Celebrities Celebrate Pongal and Makar Sankranti with Heartfelt Wishes

Tensions Rise in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin as Rajat Confronts Savi Over Missing Kiaan

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 7:25 AM | Source: Star Plus

The latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin features a dramatic turn of events as Ashika takes charge after Kiaan goes missing, while Kiaan is actually found enjoying his video games.

  • Ashika, who has re-entered the lives of Savi and Rajat, attempts to create conflict by falsely accusing Savi of negligence regarding Kiaan.
  • Kiaan's disappearance leads to heightened tensions and confrontations, especially when Rajat confronts Savi about Kiaan's whereabouts.
  • Ashika's manipulative tactics are aimed at driving a wedge between Rajat and Savi, leveraging Kiaan as a pawn in her scheme.
  • The episode poses a cliffhanger questioning Kiaan's safety and the real motives behind his disappearance.
Rajat shouts at Savi, demanding to know where Kiaan is, showcasing increasing frustration and concern over his son's safety.

The unfolding drama emphasizes themes of trust and manipulation, leaving viewers eager to see how Rajat and Savi will navigate this twist in their relationship.
newTitle: Tensions Rise in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin as Rajat Confronts Savi Over Missing Kiaan
